name: Genie Game
description:
Instructions:

Goal: Traverse all 3 levels and collect all 3 wish orbs

Abilities: You get a new ability with each wish you gather

0 wishes: Press E to freeze time

Press Space Bar to Jump

WASD to move around

Mouse or keypad to move camera

1 wish: Gain ability to double jump

2 wishes: Hold left shift to sprint

3 wishes: You win!

genie lamp - Google Search is the cover and title image
